Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Communist \Com"mu*nist\, n. [F. communiste.] 1. An advocate for the theory or practice of communism. [1913 Webster]
2. A supporter of the commune of Paris. [1913 Webster]

communist adj : relating to or marked by communism; "Communist Party"; "communist governments"; "communistic propaganda" [syn: {communistic}] n 1: a member of the communist party 2: a socialist who advocates communism [syn: {commie}]
